aboutpara: I'm a graduate student in the Computer Graphics & Game Technology program at the University of Pennsylvania. I build real-time graphics systems, animation tools, Vulkan renderers, and generative art pipelines. My work spans GPU programming, character animation, procedural tools, and AI-assisted content creation.
